description: Grades predicted by teachers will now be awarded where marks were downgraded, an exam board says.
title: A-level and IGCSE U-turn: Isle of Man students to get predicted grades
title_page: A-level and IGCSE U-turn: Isle of Man students to get predicted grades - BBC News
maintext: She said the downgrading of results - by as much as two grades in some cases - was "never going to be acceptable" and while it was "never easy" for an organisation to admit that it was wrong, it was "the right thing to do".
